name: The Druidic Beastiary
landing_text: $(o)$(l)The complete guide to damage types and mob resistances!$()$(br2)In $(#3a4e19)$(l)Druidic Quest,$() mobs have resistances and weaknesses which will greatly impact your combat experience.$(br2)$(#3a4e19)$(o)$(l)The Druidic Beastiary$() contains the knowledge you need to gain the upper-hand against whatever foes you may face!
